title: Wansa-kun (Little Wansa)
synopsis: The hero of Wansa-kun is Wansa, a puppy who is sold for a pittance, then escapes, and spends much of the rest of the series looking for his mother.
staff: [['Nishizaki, Yoshinobu', ['Producer', ' Series Composition', ' Planning']], ['Yamamoto, Eiichi', ['Director']], ['Hata, Masami', ['Episode Director']], ['Fujikawa, Keisuke', ['Theme Song Lyrics']]]
